action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes three Draconic Strike attacks.

action.name: Draconic Strike
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) Slashing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the start of the githyanki's next turn.

action.name: Conjured Dragon's Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}, each creature in a 90-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 27 ({@damage 6d8}) Fire damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) Force damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks):

spellcasting.name: Misty Step (3/Day)
headerEntries: The githyanki casts {@spell Misty Step|XPHB}, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
